sentence.Network_en: We don't live in the lap of luxury, but we're comfortable.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的生活虽然并非锦衣玉食，也算是衣食无忧。

sentence.Network_en: Politicians want a lap-dog press which will uncritically report their propaganda.
sentence.Network_cn: 政客们想要的是不问是非、甘为他们搞宣传的哈巴狗一样的新闻媒体。

sentence.Network_en: By half distance we held a comfortable two-lap lead.
sentence.Network_cn: 到半程时，我们轻松领先两圈。

auth_sentence.content: It was on the first lap around Buckingham Palace.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was on the first lap around Buckingham Palace.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was on the first lap around Buckingham Palace.

auth_sentence.content: Her British fans will lap it up as well.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her British fans will lap it up as well.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her British fans will lap it up as well.

auth_sentence.content: Two-year-old Deng Gee whimpers in her father's lap.
auth_sentence.res_content: Two-year-old Deng Gee whimpers in her father's lap.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Two-year-old Deng Gee whimpers in her father's lap.
